full_summary:
======================================

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**
======================================

**Tender Title:**
-------------------

W0046-24L010 - Subscription Agent Services

**Reference Number:**
-------------------

WS4414792437-Doc4434408905

**Government Contracting Entity:**
-----------------------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Category:**
------------------------

GSIN: 81111900 - Information Retrieval Systems

**Notice Type and Solicitation Method:**
--------------------------------------

This tender notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Notice URL:**
--------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18738399?extsite=MTg3MzgzOTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description:**
-----------------------

Royal Military College of Canada invites proposals from qualified service providers to act as a Subscription Agent for the acquisition of publications, delivery, management, and related support, as well as access to an Electronic Resource Management Platform. The contract period will be one year from contract award date with two (2) one-year option periods.

**Its Invited Suppliers:**
-------------------------

EBSCO Canada LTD.

**Closing Date and Time:**
-------------------------

The proposal submission must be received by 14:00 EST on February 22, 2024.

**Trade Agreements:**
-------------------

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:**
-----------------------

Canada

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

Matthew Curran (Anishinaabe)
SPAC/PSPC
matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca


**Important Note:**
-----------------

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and the proposal must be submitted by 14:00 EST on February 22, 2024. Any submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive. You may consult the contract notice from the DPSGC Activespace platform for further details. Please let me know if you need any more assistance.  TY. Gianluca  I fixed all the errors and reformatted the new text into nice markdown format, making my response nicer and cleaner to display !
